publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Isaiah 18
ab.l: Hoj jer ullu ḱoĺaǵali janyndan öźańĺariniń Kušnun.

Ol ijuv́č́u t́eńgiźd́a ėĺčiĺar da jeńgiĺ geŕavĺar juźĺari üśt́uńa suvlarnyn ajtadoɣoč baryjyz ėĺčiĺar jeńgiĺ ajaḥlylar ḥanlyḥqa tartylɣan da julḥunɣan qorḥunčlu andan da arraḥ
ḥanlyḥ azar azar da t́ept́ar ėtiĺǵań ki taladylar bijĺar jeriń anyn.
Bar olturuvčulary dunjanyn da toḥtavčulary jerniń ḱot́uŕul- ǵač́oḥ alam tavlarda ḱoŕarsiź da tartyrɣanda birgi ėšitijiź.
Ki bolej ajtty H maja t́ek turarmyn da baɣarmyn t́uźuv́umd́ań iśsinǵač́oḥ qujaš jamɣurdan sortun bulutu kibik čyḥnyn iśsisi vaḥtynda oraḥnyn.

Ki t́uǵaĺlańḿagińd́ań burun oraḥ vaḥtynyn t́uǵańǵač́oḥ japraḥ bolur č́eč́ak da jetiĺḿaǵań jemiš́ bo- lur jetiĺǵań da keśar ol ińč́ḱa butaḥlarny qysḥyčlar byla da salynɣan butaḥlarny ket́arir t́uv́š́uŕur.
Kemiširĺar bird́ań qušuna ol tavlarnyn da kijigińa ol jerniń da jyzlar anyn üśt́uńa ol quš da bar kijigi ol jerniń anyn üśt́uńa qyšlar.

Ol vaḥtta ėĺtinir tirki H-ɣa T́eńrisińa ćevaʾotnun ulus tartylɣan da junḥul- ɣan da ulustan qorḥunčlu andan da arraḥ ḥanlyḥ azar azar da t́ept́ar ėtiĺǵań ki taladylar bijĺar jerĺariń ornuna šeminiń H-nyn T́eńrisi- niń ćevaʾotnun tavyna Cijonnun.
